TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT
**Contract Name**: CSC Structured Intervention Unit Upgrades, Stony Mountain, Manitoba
**Contract Reference**: WS3731669361-Doc3741716880
**Publication Date**: November 9, 2022

**Procurement Details**
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Procurement Category**: CNST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 30, 2022

**Contract Description**
The proposed contract involves modernizing the Structured Intervention Unit at Stony Mountain Institution, which includes renovating various rooms, replacing security glazing, constructing weather shield roof structures, replacing security grilles, and upgrading existing electronic security systems. The contractor must complete the Work within 24 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

**Solicitation Process**
This posting is the first phase (Phase One) of a two-phase solicitation process. The first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers, while the second phase (Phase Two) will invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

**Submission Requirements**
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 29, 2022, at 2:00 PM MST. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information**
For more information, please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14592668](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14592668). For inquiries, contact:

Alex Tikhonovitch
alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
